GP1.title: Global Protect Connection
GP1.failText: You must be connected to the Global Protect VPN.

GP2.title: Valid Operating System
GP2.failText: You must use Windows or Mac operating system.

GP3.title: Antivirus Enabled
GP3.failText: You must turn on your antivirus.

GP4.title: Antivirus Approval
GP4.failText: Your antivirus must be on the following list of approved antiviruses: Bitdefender (2022), Kaspersky (2023), Norton (2021), McAfee (2022), Avast (2021), AVG (2022), Trend Micro (2023), ESET (2022), Sophos (2021), Malwarebytes (2022), Panda Security (2023), Comodo (2022), F-Secure (2021), G Data (2022), Webroot (2023), BullGuard (2022), VIPRE (2021), ZoneAlarm (2022), TotalAV (2023), Cylance (2022), Avira (2021), Adaware (2022), ClamAV (2023), Emsisoft (2021), Fortinet (2022), Quick Heal (2023), Seqrite (2022), AhnLab (2021), Tencent (2022), Qihoo 360 (2023), Kingsoft (2022), Rising Antivirus (2021), Symantec (2022)

GP5.title: Valid Antivirus Definitions
GP5.failText: Your antivirus definitions must be updated from within 60 days

GP6.title: Sufficient Amount of RAM
GP6.failText: Your computer must have atleast 8GB of RAM. Without 8GB of RAM, you may experience issues using TRU's platform that cannot be resolved by TRU's IT department.
